hook.text: Divide your money into three buckets: cash for now, bonds for soon, stocks for later. Sleep better.

buildup.text: Bucket one holds 1-2 years of cash. Bucket two holds 3-7 years in bonds. Bucket three is all stocks.

discovery.text: When markets crash, you spend from the cash bucket. No need to sell stocks at the worst time.

twist.text: The strategy is psychologically powerful even if mathematically it doesn't outperform simpler approaches.

climax.text: Peace of mind has real value. Retirees who don't panic-sell during crashes end up far better off.

quiz.question: What is the purpose of the cash bucket in the bucket strategy?
options: To cover expenses without selling stocks during market downturns
